
```{r}
  library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
  data <- readxl::read_xlsx("Public-Dataset-Daily-County-Age-Group.XLSX")
```

```{r}
  
  bedford_data <- data[which(data$COUNTY == "Bedford"),]        
  
  bedford_graph <- ggplot(bedford_data, aes(DATE, CASE_COUNT)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(col = AGE_GROUP), size = 1) +
  labs(title="Age Data for Bedford County", col="Age Range") + 
  xlab("Date") + ylab("Case Count")
  
  bedford_graph
```

```{r}
  rutherford_data <- data[which(data$COUNTY == "Rutherford"),]

  rutherford_graph <- ggplot(rutherford_data, aes(DATE, CASE_COUNT)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(col = AGE_GROUP)) +
  labs(title="Age Data for Rutherford County", col="Age Range") + 
  xlab("Date") + ylab("Case Count")
  
  rutherford_graph
```
